records.Most Wins: SouthAfrica has the highest winning percentage in T20s (31 wins from 47)
records.Highest Total In Innings: SriLanka scored 260-6 against Kenya, at Johannesburg on 14-Sep-2007
records.Most Sixers By Team: 28 Sixers were hit in the match between India and NewZealand at ChristChurch
records.Most Man Of The Match Awards: Shahid Afridi of Pakistan, holds a record of 7 man of the match awards
records.Highest Score: Richard Levi of NewZealand, holds the record for maximum score, 117*
records.Fastest Hundred: Richard Levi of NewZealand, holds the record for the fastest hundred of just 45balls*
records.Most Runs In An Over: Yuvraj Singh of India scored 36 runs in an over against England
records.Best Bowling: Ajantha Mendis of SriLanka has the best bowling figures, 6-16, against Australia
records.Most Wickets: Saeed Ajmal of Pakistan has maximum career wickets, 60 from 42 matches
records.Hat-trick: Brett Lee of Australia, Jacob Oram & Tim Southee of NewZealand have all taken hat-tricks
